author: francescobrivio
body:
In preparation for the merge of [#42431 ](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/42431) (still under review), I'm assigning to the `db` signature the new packages proposed there:
 - `CondCore/CondHDF5ESSource`
 - `CondFormats/SerializationHelper`

This PR can probably be merged after the `cmssw` one has converged.

FYI @cms-sw/db-l2 @Dr15Jones
title: Assign new packages to db
